name: Mint Julep (Southern Style)
instructions: In silver mug or collins glass, dissolve powdered sugar with water. Fill with finely shaved ice and add bourbon. Stir until glass is heavily frosted, adding more ice if necessary. (Do not hold glass with hand while stirring.) Decorate with sprigs of fresh mint so that the tops are about two inches above the rim of glass. Use short straws so that it will be necessary to bury nose in mint, which is intended for scent rather than taste.

instructions: Pour into ice-filled highball glass. Stir well.

instructions: Pour bourbon, syrup, bitters, and coffee into ice-filled old-fashioned glass and stir. Add soda water and stir again. Garnish with orange and cherry.

name: Dry Martini
instructions: serve with an olive.

name: Salty Dog
instructions: Rim highball glass with lemon and salt. Fill with ice. Add vodka and grapefruit juice and stir.

name: Dr. Cook
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into wine glass.

name: Dillatini Cocktail
instructions: Serve with a dilly bean.

name: Chi-Town Flip
instructions: Shake first six ingredients without ice. Add ice and shake again. Strain into ice-filled Collins glass. Add bitters and top with nutmeg.

name: Chef's Pain
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Sampan Shipwreck A
instructions: Shake well with ice. Double-strain into chilled cocktail glass. Perch pineapple on rim of glass.

name: Chas
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add orange twist.

name: Goat's Delight
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Russian Bear Cocktail
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Character Development
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add grapefruit twist.

name: Ruby Red
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add grapefruit twist.

name: Chaplin
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

name: Rouxby Red

instructions: Rim chilled cocktail glass with lemon and salt. Shake remaining ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

name: Rosemary Clementine Sparkle
instructions: Squeeze clementine into mixing glass. Twist rind and add to glass. Add vodka, lemon juice, syrup, and rosemary sprig. Add ice and shake. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Top with sparkling wine or Champagne. Garnish with remaining rosemary sprig.

name: Chapel Hill
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add orange twist.

name: Robin's Nest
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Chancellor Cocktail
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

instructions: Add 1 oz. Amaretto di Saronno to a cup of black coffee. Top with whipped cream.

name: Carre Reprise
instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Add lemon twist.

name: Gilroy Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Redhead Martini
ingredient-5: Chilled Moscato d'Asti or sweet sparkling wine
instructions: Muddle halved strawberries in mixing glass with lemon juice and syrup. Add vodka and ice and shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add sparkling wine. Garnish with the strawberry.

name: Red Apple
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Canal Street Daisy
instructions: Add Scotch and juices to ice-filled Collins glass and stir. Fill with soda water and stir again. Garnish with orange.

name: Canadian Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add grapefruit twist.

instructions: Moisten rim of old-fashioned glass with maraschino liqueur. Fill with ice. Shake ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

name: Orange Smile
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into stem goblet.

name: Purple Passion Iced Tea
instructions: Pour ingredients into ice-filled highball glass in order listed and stir. Add lemon twist.

name: Canadian Breeze
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with pineapple and cherry.

name: Purple Passion
instructions: Shake with ice. Pour with ice into Collins glass.

name: Cameron's Kick Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Georgia Mint Julep
instructions: Muddle mint and syrup in Collins glass. Fill with ice. Add brandy and peach-flavored brandy. Stir and garnish with additional mint.

instructions: Shake first five ingredients with ice. Strain into shaved ice-filled Collins glass. Fill with soda water and garnish with orange, lemon, and cherry. Serve with straws.

name: Boston Side Car
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

instructions: Stir first three ingredients in ice-filled highball glass. Fill with ginger ale.

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry and orange.

instructions: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bourbon Renewal
instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass.

name: Bourbon Highball
instructions: Pour whiskey into ice-filled highball glass. Fill with ginger ale or soda water and stir. Add lemon twist.

name: Bourbon And Elder
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into chilled old-fashioned glass. Add lemon twist.

name: Bourbon Crusta

instructions: Rim chilled cocktail glass with lemon and sugar. Curl the zest spiral in glass. Stir remaining ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

name: Froupe Cocktail
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bourbon A La Creme
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice. Strain into chilled old-fashioned glass.

instructions: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add lemon twist.

instructions: Mix ingredients together, stirring often, in a large container, adding salt to taste. Chill for at least 24 hours before serving. Serve in icefilled old-fashioned glasses.

name: White Cargo Cocktail
instructions: Shake until thoroughly mixed and add water or sauterne if the mixture if too thick. Serve in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Blood and Sand
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: The Blinker
instructions: Shake and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with grapefruit twist or raspberry.

name: Blarney Stone Cocktail
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add orange twist and olive.

instructions: Add grenadine, lemon juice, and bitters to collins filled with ice. Top  with wedge of lime. with ginger ale. Notch an orange slice and slide down side of glass.

instructions: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry.

instructions: Shake and strain into collins glass over ice cubes. Add enough water to fill glass. Serve with straws.

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into stein or metal cup. Add ice cubes and decorate with fruit

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with edible flowers.

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

instructions: Stir with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Shake well with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry.

instructions: serve with an olive.

instructions: Shake with ice and strain into highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir.
